interpretation: High vocal confidence - speaks with clarity, steady pace, and minimal hesitation
recommendations: Consider reducing frequent pausing - 51.1% of speech time is pauses. Aim for 20-40% pause time.
Try to reduce some long pauses - 6 pause(s) longer than 1 second detected. A few long pauses are fine, but many can reduce flow.
Consider speaking slightly faster - 97.7 WPM is a bit slow. A comfortable pace is 100-220 WPM.
Try to improve speech fluency - 13 pauses detected makes speech somewhat choppy. Practice speaking more smoothly.
